text: The 1979 African Women's Handball Championship was the third edition of the African Women's Handball Championship, held in Congo from 20 to 31 July 1979. It acted as the African qualifying tournament for the 1980 Summer Olympics qualifying tournament. ==Knockout stage== ===Bracket=== ===Semifinals=== \---- ===Third place game=== ===Final=== ==Final ranking== {| class="infobox bordered" |- |width=10px bgcolor=#ccffcc| ||Qualified for the 1980 Summer Olympics qualifying tournament |} {| class="wikitable" !Rank !Team |-bgcolor=ccffcc |align=center|File:gold medal icon.svg|| |- |align=center|File:silver medal icon.svg|| |- |align=center|File:bronze medal icon.svg|| |- |align=center|4|| |- |align=center|5|| |- |align=center|6|| |- |align=center|7|| |- |align=center|8|| |- |align=center|9|| |} ==External links== *Results on todor66.com 1979 Women African Women's Handball Championship Category:1979 in African handball Category:International sports competitions hosted by the Republic of the Congo Category:1979 in the Republic of the Congo Category:Women's handball in the Republic of the Congo Category:July 1979 sports events in Africa
title: 1979 African Women's Handball Championship
